alert.note: Alert for Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 11 at 2:48PM CST until March 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland San Patricio and Inland Refugio Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Saturday. For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 8 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
